summary: This is an email forwarding a list of potential defense witnesses in the Epstein case from an NYPD/FBI task force member to an Assistant United States Attorney, with instructions to research the individuals but not contact them directly.

persons.name: Paul
persons.context: Addressed in the email as the person who will research the list of potential defense witnesses, likely a prosecutor or investigator.

keyFacts: An NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force compiled a list of potential defense witnesses in the Epstein case.
The list was forwarded to an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York on October 20, 2021.
Instructions were given to research the individuals on the list but not to contact them directly.
